title: Grade Point - GPA & Homework Download
text: GradePoint is a quick and easy grade tracker/calculator, gpa calculator, or homework calendar/agenda app for students. You can create classes, give them a name, and set their grades and weights. You can choose to put in your a letter grade, percent, or use the built in grade calculator. With this information, the app calculates the GPA based on this information. You can also edit the values for all of the grade weights. That wasn't good enough? You can also use those same classes to seamlessly integrate assignment or homework reminders for each class. You can easily view these assignments at a glance with the list or with a calendar. You can also set due dates and reminders to notify you when these assignments are due. With Premium, you can take attach notes or photos to any assignment. Finish the assignment early? Just swipe to the right to complete an assignment, from there you will not be notified for it. You can create, edit, and delete assignments or classes with ease. Give your academic journey a boost with GradePointDisclaimer: This app is created and managed by Atemnkeng Fontem and is not affiliated with Westerville City SchoolsBy downloading this app you're agreeing to our Terms and ConditionsLink to Terms and Conditions:https://gradepointapp.wixsite.com/website
